snippet: Leaflets distributed this week in North Waziristan, the main hub of Taliban militancy in Pakistan, announced that the spokesman, Sajjid Mohmand, was being replaced.
abstract: Leaflets distributed in North Waziristan, main hub of Taliban militancy in Pakistan, announce that spokesman Sajjid Mohmand is being replaced.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and ISMAIL KHAN
byline.contributor: Declan Walsh reported from London, and Ismail Khan from Peshawar, Pakistan. Ehsanullah Tipu Mehsud contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: Leaflets distributed this week in North Waziristan, the main hub of Taliban militancy in Pakistan, announced that the spokesman, Sajjid Mohmand, was being replaced.

headline.main: Taliban Spokesman Is Ousted for ‘Creating Mistrust’
headline.print_headline: Taliban Spokesman Is Ousted for ‘Creating Mistrust’
